text: Haim Michael Revivo (; born February 22, 1972 in Ashdod) is a former Israeli football player. He played for Maccabi Haifa, Celta Vigo, Fenerbah√ße, Galatasaray. He was best known for his free kick goals and his celebrations after these goals. He was a member in the Israeli national team. He currently lives in Los Angeles. title: Haim Revivo
